interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: COLORGRAM Artist Formula Auto Brow Pencil 0.25g- True Beauty K-Drama Makeup, Built-in-Spoolie, Clump-Free Formula, Softly Glides, Natural Look (01 Ash Brown) Review Date: 2021/06/19 Store: COLORGRAM Product Description: ["Featuring a unique, triangular tip, Brow Definer's retractable pencil design is ideal for outlining and filling your brows in one fluid motion. The custom spooley end is created with a precise width and firmness to seamlessly blend color."] Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'COLORGRAM', 'Item Form': 'Pencil', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening', 'Product Dimensions': '0.59 x 0.71 x 4.53 inches; 3.7 Ounces'} Review Text: This was pretty impossible to use. It was so dry and hard that it wouldn’t even apply color to my brow. I
I would strongly suggest going with the Maybelline brow precise or the Maybelline brow ultra slim. Both of those are phenomenal and fairly priced. I think you can get them with Amazon’s subscribe and save, too. Review Title: I could barely get this to apply to my brow…old product? Rating: 1.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Manicure and Pedicure Nail Clipper from POWERGROOMING - Powerful Trimmer for Thick and Thin Finger Nails and Toe Nails - Included Nail File and"Catcher" for Easy Cleanup (1 Pack) POWERGROOMING {'Brand': 'POWERGROOMING', 'Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Blade Edge': 'Straight', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Target Audience': 'Women, Men', 'Package Dimensions': '3.8 x 1.3 x 1 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'UPC': '653233212735', 'Manufacturer': 'POWERGROOMING'} I really loved the modern look of these clippers and file; however, i took one star away as the small nail file is not as sharp as I would have liked. I'm used to an old Revlon diamond file that works much faster.
As others have said, you can very easily remove the black base on the nail clippers if it seems unwieldy to you. It felt just fine to me. Super attractive clippers and file in a leather look case. Aussie Hairspray Instant Freeze Extreme Hold 7 Ounce (207ml) (2 Pack) Aussie ['Aussie Hairspray Instant Freeze Extreme Hold 7 Ounce (207ml) (2 Pack)'] {'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Liquid Volume': '7 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Brand': 'Aussie', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '4.3 x 2 x 8.5 inches; 11.04 Ounces', 'UPC': '381519078040 787734409902 038785520000', 'Manufacturer': 'Aussie'} A tiny spritz of this not only holds my hair, but makes it look fuller.
I imagine it will last a long time; so, its also a great value.
I was always loath to try these freeze-type hairsprays, thinking they would look stiff, but this doesn’t.
No discernible fragrance, either. Exactly what I’ve been looking for. Fantastic hold with no residue or helmet head. COLORGRAM Artist Formula Auto Brow Pencil 0.25g- True Beauty K-Drama Makeup, Built-in-Spoolie, Clump-Free Formula, Softly Glides, Natural Look (01 Ash Brown) COLORGRAM ["Featuring a unique, triangular tip, Brow Definer's retractable pencil design is ideal for outlining and filling your brows in one fluid motion. The custom spooley end is created with a precise width and firmness to seamlessly blend color."] {'Brand': 'COLORGRAM', 'Item Form': 'Pencil', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening', 'Product Dimensions': '0.59 x 0.71 x 4.53 inches; 3.7 Ounces'} This was pretty impossible to use. It was so dry and hard that it wouldn’t even apply color to my brow. I
I would strongly suggest going with the Maybelline brow precise or the Maybelline brow ultra slim. Both of those are phenomenal and fairly priced. I think you can get them with Amazon’s subscribe and save, too. I could barely get this to apply to my brow…old product?
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user has a clear affinity for grooming tools, particularly manicure and pedicure items, focusing on modern designs. Their recent purchase indicates an exploration into brow grooming products, although this new interest came with frustration due to poor performance, highlighting their continued emphasis on quality and functionality.

- **Performance Expectations:** They uphold high standards for product performance, as evidenced by their dissatisfaction with the recent brow pencil, which failed to deliver effective application. This encounter emphasizes their commitment to finding reliable grooming and hair care alternatives that not only meet but exceed their expectations.

- **Practicality:** Convenience and ease of use remain paramount for the user, reflected in their preference for products that facilitate smooth application and are user-friendly. This practicality extends across their grooming and hair care interests.

- **Gender Inclusivity:** The user continues to support products that cater to a diverse audience, maintaining their preference for inclusive grooming and hair care options that accommodate all genders.

- **Overall Satisfaction:** While the user has expressed satisfaction with many effective products, the recent experience serves as a reminder of the importance of product quality. Their habit of providing feedback remains strong, ensuring that both positive and negative experiences influence their future purchasing decisions. 

This update demonstrates the user's commitment to stylish, effective, and high-performing grooming and hair products while recognizing the ongoing journey to find suitable options.
